fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
* Circular Economy 
* Bioeconomy 
* Europe 2020 
* Horizon 2020 
* Revision of the fertilizer regulation 
* Agricultural policy, including organic production 
* Animal by-product regulation 
* End-of-waste and related issues
organisation_name: European Consortium of the Organic-based Fertilizer Industry (ECOFI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Fertilisers Working Group#E01320#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1320#Observer#C#Subgroup of the Commission expert group on Recovery Rules for Fertilising Products
goals__remit: ECOFI represents the European producers of Organic Fertilizers, Organo-Mineral Fertilizers and Organic Soil Improvers. It provides a forum for members to discuss common issues and to forge consensus at the European level on key technical and political issues facing the sector.
relevant_communication:
* Various meetings with EU officials and MEPs 
* Publication of position papers and background papers on relevant policy issues 
* Collaboration with other industry sectors and stakeholders on areas of common interest
